summary: Multi-tenancy refactor testing completed successfully. All 39 backend tests pass (16 multitenancy + 23 regression). Frontend UI verified - all dashboard tabs load correctly. Team Sudbeck has 58 members with all data properly scoped by team_id.
critical_code_review_comments: All APIs correctly filter by team_id for data isolation
Admin Panel correctly shows Teams (1) and Users (58)
state_manager role has admin privileges as expected
Migration endpoint successfully assigned all 58 users to Team Sudbeck
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Verified existing Team Sudbeck with 58 users.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-tenancy refactor is complete and working. Team Sudbeck is the default team with 58 members. All data (activities, interviews, recruiting, suitability forms, NPA tracker, etc.) is properly scoped by team_id. Admin Panel allows state_managers to manage teams and user assignments. No cross-team access is possible as all queries filter by team_id.

authentication.state_manager_login: PASS - Spencer Sudbeck can login successfully
authentication.user_team_assignment: PASS - All 58 users assigned to Team Sudbeck

admin_panel.teams_tab: PASS - Shows Team Sudbeck with 58 members
admin_panel.users_tab: PASS - Shows all 58 users with team assignments
admin_panel.create_team: PASS - Can create new teams (tested and cleaned up)
admin_panel.assign_user: PASS - Can assign users to different teams

team_scoped_data.team_members: PASS - Returns members filtered by team
team_scoped_data.reports: PASS - Reports work with team filtering

data_isolation.team_count_matches: PASS - Team user count matches admin users
